statements: SELECT * FROM crop_rotation_schedule ORDER BY planting_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT crop_name, nutrient_requirements FROM crop_rotation_schedule WHERE harvest_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY harvest_date;
SELECT crop_name, planting_date, harvest_date FROM crop_rotation_schedule WHERE nutrient_requirements ->> 'nitrogen' > '50' ORDER BY planting_date;
SELECT DISTINCT crop_name FROM crop_rotation_schedule ORDER BY crop_name;
SELECT * FROM crop_rotation_schedule WHERE nutrient_requirements -> 'phosphorus' < '10' AND nutrient_requirements -> 'potassium' < '20' ORDER BY crop_name;
SELECT * FROM crop_rotation_schedule ORDER BY planting_date DESC, harvest_date ASC
SELECT rotation_id, crop_name FROM crop_rotation_schedule WHERE crop_name = 'Tomato' AND nutrient_requirements->'ph' > 6
SELECT rotation_id, crop_name, planting_date, harvest_date FROM crop_rotation_schedule WHERE nutrient_requirements->>'moisture' = 'high'
SELECT * FROM crop_rotation_schedule WHERE planting_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT rotation_id, crop_name, nutrient_requirements->'ph' AS ph_level FROM crop_rotation_schedule ORDER BY ph_level
SELECT * FROM Crop_Rotation_Schedule WHERE Rotation_Sequence = 1;
SELECT Crop_Name, Harvest_Date FROM Crop_Rotation_Schedule WHERE Planting_Date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT Nutrient_Name, Depletion_Level FROM Nutrient_Depletion WHERE Soil_Type = 'Clay';
SELECT Schedule_ID, Planting_Date FROM Crop_Rotation_Schedule WHERE Harvest_Date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Nutrient_Depletion WHERE Replenishment_Method = 'Fertilization';
SELECT * FROM Crop_Rotation_Schedule WHERE Rotation_Sequence > 3 ORDER BY Planting_Date DESC;
SELECT Crop_Name, Harvest_Date FROM Crop_Rotation_Schedule WHERE Harvest_Date >= '2023-01-01' AND Harvest_Date <= '2023-12-31';
SELECT Nutrient_Name, Soil_Type, Depletion_Level FROM Nutrient_Depletion WHERE Depletion_Level > 50 ORDER BY Nutrient_Name ASC, Soil_Type DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS Total_Schedules FROM Crop_Rotation_Schedule;
SELECT Crop_Name, Harvest_Date, Rotation_Sequence FROM Crop_Rotation_Schedule WHERE Crop_Name LIKE 'Corn%' ORDER BY Rotation_Sequence ASC;
SELECT * FROM CropRotationSchedule;
SELECT crop_name, planting_date, harvest_date FROM CropRotationSchedule WHERE harvest_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT nutrient_name, optimal_range FROM NutrientContent WHERE nutrient_name LIKE '%nitrogen%';
SELECT sample_date, nutrient_level FROM SoilAnalysis WHERE nutrient_level > 5.0 ORDER BY sample_date DESC;
SELECT s.analysis_id, s.sample_date, c.crop_name FROM SoilAnalysis s INNER JOIN CropRotationSchedule c ON s.crop_id = c.crop_id;
SELECT crop_name, planting_date, harvest_date FROM CropRotationSchedule ORDER BY planting_date ASC, harvest_date DESC;
SELECT nutrient_name, optimal_range FROM NutrientContent WHERE LENGTH(optimal_range) > 10;
SELECT * FROM SoilAnalysis WHERE nutrient_level > 5 ORDER BY nutrient_level DESC;
SELECT crop_name, planting_date, harvest_date FROM CropRotationSchedule WHERE harvest_date > '2023-01-01' ORDER BY harvest_date;

SELECT crop_name, planting_date, harvest_date, nutrient_name, nutrient_level FROM CropRotationSchedule JOIN SoilAnalysis ON CropRotationSchedule.crop_id = SoilAnalysis.crop_id JOIN NutrientContent ON SoilAnalysis.analysis_id = NutrientContent.nutrient_id;
SELECT * FROM CropRotationSchedule;
SELECT crop_name, planting_date FROM CropRotationSchedule WHERE rotation_id = 1;
SELECT nutrient_type, depletion_amount FROM NutrientDepletion WHERE soil_condition = 'acidic';
SELECT * FROM FieldConditions WHERE moisture_level > 5 ORDER BY soil_ph DESC;
SELECT field_name, soil_ph, moisture_level FROM FieldConditions WHERE field_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM CropRotationSchedule WHERE crop_name='Corn' ORDER BY planting_date DESC;
SELECT nutrient_type, depletion_amount FROM NutrientDepletion WHERE soil_condition='Poor' ORDER BY depletion_amount ASC;
SELECT rotation_id, crop_name, planting_date, harvest_date FROM CropRotationSchedule WHERE planting_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM FieldConditions WHERE soil_ph < 6.5 AND moisture_level > 50 ORDER BY field_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM NutrientReplenishment WHERE nutrient_type='Nitrogen' AND replenishment_amount > 100 ORDER BY soil_condition DESC, replenishment_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM crop_rotation_schedule ORDER BY planting_date DESC;
SELECT id, crop_name, planting_date, harvesting_date FROM crop_rotation_schedule WHERE planting_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY planting_date ASC;
SELECT crop_name, planting_date, harvesting_date FROM crop_rotation_schedule WHERE crop_name = 'Corn' AND harvesting_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM nutrient_depletion WHERE depletion_rate > 0.5 ORDER BY depletion_rate DESC;
SELECT field_name, size_acres FROM field ORDER BY size_acres DESC;
SELECT * FROM crop_rotation_schedule WHERE planting_date > '2022-06-01';
SELECT crop_name, planting_date, harvesting_date FROM crop_rotation_schedule WHERE crop_name = 'Corn' ORDER BY planting_date DESC;
SELECT field_name, size_acres FROM field WHERE size_acres > 10 ORDER BY field_name;
SELECT crop_name, crop_type, optimal_growing_season FROM crop WHERE optimal_growing_season LIKE '%summer%';
SELECT rotation_name, field_name, crop_name FROM rotation r JOIN field f ON r.field_id = f.id JOIN crop c ON r.crop_id = c.id ORDER BY f.size_acjson['-'];
